original_text: When Moses had put up God's Tent, he poured special oil on it. He also poured it on the things in the tent, the altar and all the tools. This showed that all these things were special for God to use.
korean_text: 모세가 장막 세우기를 끝내고 그것에 기름을 발라 거룩히 구별하고 또 그 모든 기구와 제단과 그 모든 기물에 기름을 발라 거룩히 구별한 날에

sentences.original_text: When Moses had put up God's Tent
he poured special oil on it
He also poured it on the things in the tent
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 장막 안의 물건들에도 기름을 부었다

sentences.original_text: the altar and all the tools
This showed that all these things
were special for God to use
